subject: Help In Junit Testing
msgSnippet: Hai, I just looked into the junit framework and trying to implement the same for testing our swing UI. On looking them at first the process seems to confusing
messageBody:
Hai,

I just looked into the junit framework and trying to implement the same for testing our swing UI. On looking them at first the process seems to confusing and have some startup problems in writing the test codes.

Could someone help by giving the details on how to implement the junit for swing ui with some links for documents that would enable me to start writing the sample codes. Kindly help me giving a clear picture with some instance code ie. any sample code with their source and their corresponding test code.


I really have problems proceeding with junit. Thanks for the friends who helped me giving a link to book "Test Driven Programming". The problem being i don't see any pdf relating to the book. Send me some examples atleast for a source code and its corresponding test code for my clear understanding.

Help needed desperately !!!

Thanks.

Regards,

Vimal Kumar.
